front.title: IEEE Standards for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Supplement to Demand Priority Access Method, Physical Layer and Repeater Specifications: Redundant Links

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Withdrawn Standard. Supplement to the IEEE 802.12 Demand Priority Access Method allowing optional implementation of redundant links to facilitate automatic recovery of network connectivity in case of link or repeater failure anywhere in the network path are specified. Rules for connecting redundant links within a network are defined.
